title.en: Seminar on Enterprise Software: Master's Seminar

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
Week 24: Introductory Seminar 1 (mandatory)
Week 25: Introductory Seminar 2 (mandatory)
Weeks 26-30: Individual consultations (optional)
Weeks 31-37: Presentation sessions (mandatory)
description.et:
24. nädal:  sissejuhatav seminar 1 (kohustuslik)
25. nädal: sissejuhatav seminar 2 (kohustuslik)
26. - 30. Nädal: individuaalsed konsultatsioonid (valikuline)
31. - 37. Nädal: esitlusseansid (kohustuslik)

objectives.en: This seminar will cover advanced topics in the field of enterprise software, both from a technology and from an engineering perspectives. Students will engage in active learning by reading academic and industry papers on various topics in the field, presenting these papers to the class, and participating in focused discussions.
objectives.et: Seminaris tutvutakse ettevõttetarkvara süvateemidega, seda nii tehnoloogilises kui ka insenerlikus aspektis. Omandatakse kogemused tööks kirjandusega selles valdkonnas, samuti vastava info presenteerimiseks ja  erialastes diskussioonides rakendamiseks.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of this course, students should be able to:
1. Collect, analyze and present information about advanced topics in the field of enterprise software in a structured manner.
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Struktureeritult koguda, analüüsida ja esitada infot ettevõttetarkvara süvateemade kohta.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Formulate informed observations and comments about key issues and approaches in the field of enterprise software.
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Asjatundlikult formuleerida vaateid ning selgitusi võtmeküsimuste kohta ettevõttetarkvara valdkonnas.

notes.et:
Information is provided at https://courses.cs.ut.ee/ website

Teaching mode will be face-to-face in the classroom. Individual session can be conducted online.

independent_work.et: Information is provided at https://courses.cs.ut.ee/ website

description.et: level of clarity and the quality of the information

grade_preconditions.et:
* Write a report on a chosen topic
* Give an oral presentation on the topic
* Participate actively in all the mandatory seminar sessions

grade_evaluation.et: Students will be assessed based on a presentation to be given during the seminar, their attendance to the seminars and participation in class discussions, and other tasks to be indicated during the first seminar.

debt_elimination.et: One supplementary exam will be offered to students who are unable to attend the first exam or who fail the first exam.

audience.et: MSc Software Engineering curriculum students (1st year)
